Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.model.card

Class Card.CardEffectContext

java.lang.Object
org.example.eiscuno.model.card.Card.CardEffectContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
Card
public class Card.CardEffectContext extends Object implements Serializable
Inner context class that carries all necessary information for applying a card's effect.

This class is passed as a parameter to Card.applyEffect(CardEffectContext) and contains references to:

  • The current GameUno instance
  • The target Player affected by the effect
  • The color to be set (used for wild cards)
See Also:

    CardEffectContext(GameUno game, Player targetPlayer, String color)
    Creates a context with game, target player, and color.
